text: this ladies and gentlemen is the
yin-yang martini so what I did was I
printed out yangyang template and I just
cut out one side of the yin-yang
okay bingo now let's mix our drink ice
some cake vodka then we hit that with
some right white cam de cacao white
chocolate the cure hit it again with
some heavy whipping cream put a top on
and we shake okay that's all mix now
let's put on our little yin-yang garnish
gotta get some dark chocolate shavings
want really small pieces of chocolate
white chocolate - okay that are gonna
float on top if you use big thick pieces
it's gonna sink like the Titanic okay so
now we sprinkle on our Brown see that
nice little outlay then you can remove
the template and do bite and then we
grab these little chocolate melts is
there candy nuts okay and you just rest
them on and they should float okay but
you gotta keep everything thin and like
